alert.note: Alert for Canadian (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Oklahoma and east central Canadian Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Oklahoma City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Edmond, Midwest City, Del City, Bethany, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Nicoma Park, Arcadia, Tinker Air Force Base, Forest Park, Woodlawn Park, Lake Aluma, Smith Village, The Capitol and Wiley Post Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 125 and 143. Interstate 40 between mile markers 143 and 162. Interstate 44 between mile markers 119 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
